subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Guard Diana Taurasi scored 30 points to lead the Phoenix Mercury over the Detroit Shock, tying the best-of-five W.N.B.A. championship series at 1-1.
snippet: Guard Diana Taurasi scored 30 points to lead the Phoenix Mercury over the Detroit Shock, tying the best-of-five W.N.B.A. championship series at 1-1.
